description: To create a TRELBY file, select File → Save or Save As... , choose the save location, name your file, and click Save .
To open a TRELBY file, double-click the file or select File → Open , navigate to your file, and click Open .

To export a TRELBY file to another format, such as a .PDF , .RTF , .HTML , or .FOUNTAIN file, select File → Export... , choose the save location, name your file, select the file tyro from the "Save as type" drop down menu, and click Save .
